__e: The only thing I lost I really cared about.
I was trying to make something with my life, And all he cared about was her!
I mean, he was only after one thing, and it wasn't me.
I didn't care that it was his house, his bed... his girlfriend.
Do you remember writing in your diary that it did not matter whether I was a friend or an enemy since at least I was a person who understood you and could be talked to?
I'm the dead but never mourned, and whilst you got everything that you wanted, I got a family who didn't care if I lived - or if I died.
It wasn't cheap, that's for sure. But I didn't give a damn.
The only reason I did this campaign was to impress him, and he couldn't have cared less.
All I know is, it was easier before, when I just didn't give a damn about anything.
But eventually, I realized that no matter how much it hurt me...
And ever since then, no matter how far I was from you, I always thought of you as my daughter.
No matter what I did, how hard I tried, I was never good enough.
You can be an asshole all you want, but you used to care about me.
You said my father didn't care about me, but she says he came here.
They don't care about me, it's the baby they're after!
If I didn't care about these things, you wouldn't care about anything.
You said my father didn't care about me, but she says he came here.
They don't care about me, it's the baby they're after!
But you said you didn't care if she was here.
What did it matter if my mommy was mean to me or what I saw when I was you.
It got to a certain point where I just gave up. Didn't care if I lived or died.
